articles.title: Japan and Thailand agree new defense deal - CNN
articles.description: The leaders of Japan and Thailand announced a new defense agreement on Monday as well as plans to upgrade their economic relations, as Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida wrapped up the last leg of a three-nation tour of Southeast Asia.

articles.title: Painless way to shrink breast cancer using magnetic fields - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Scientists from the National University of Singapore (NUS) have found a painless way to kill breast cancer cells by exposing them to a pulsed magnetic field.

articles.title: South Korea’s consumer prices rise at fastest pace since 2008 - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Asia’s fourth-largest economy saw its consumer price index rise 4.8 percent last month from a year earlier.
articles.content:
South Koreas consumer prices rose at their fastest pace in nearly 14 years in April on the back of surging food and energy prices, in the latest sign of high inflation taking off in Asia.
